i.name: Staggering Blow
i.description: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.

q.name: Dredge Line
q.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.

w.name: Titan's Wrath
w.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.

e.name: Riptide
e.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.

r.name: Depth Charge
r.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.

i1.blurb: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Nautilus's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{pp|8 to 110}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and {{tip|root}} his target for {{pp|5|changedisplay=true|0.5 to 1.5|1 to 16;18}} seconds.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.name: Staggering Blow
notes: * The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* ''Staggering Blow's'' bonus damage will apply {{sti|life steal}} but will not interact with {{tip|critical strike}}s nor affect structures.

* ''Staggering Blow's'' root will be applied (but not the bonus damage) even if the enhanced attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or if ''Nautilus'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the root but not the bonus damage.

riot.name: Staggering Blow
riot.description: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.

riot.name: Dredge Line
riot.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.
riot.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward, the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}), and {{ e4 }}% of the Mana cost is refunded.

q1.blurb: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nautilus''' hurls his anchor forward in a line, simultaneously {{tip|airborne|dragging}} the enemy hit towards him while {{tip|dash|dashing}} towards them within {{fd|0.9}} seconds, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
If the anchor hits terrain, '''Nautilus''' dashes to the very end of its path, ''Dredge Line's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 50% and refunds {{Sti|mana|{{as|half its mana cost}}}}.
q1.name: Dredge Line
notes: * ''Dredge Line'' can interact with player-created terrain ({{ai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}, {{ai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}).
* ''Nautilus'' will dash all the way to the target's location if ''Dredge Line'' executes them.
* ''Dredge Line'' will not interrupt any movement commands ''Nautilus'' was issued pre-cast so long as their directions somewhat correlate (this is intentional to smooth out traveling/escaping).

* ''Dredge Line's'' dash's cast time and projectile speed can be manipulated to override most crowd control effects ''Nautilus'' is affected by (including displacements) so long as both their and ''Dredge Line's'' cast timing can be aligned.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability but ''Nautilus'' will still dash partway to the target.

riot.name: Titan's Wrath
riot.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.
riot.tooltip:
Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ e3 }} seconds, shielding him from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of his max Health) damage.

While the shield persists, Nautilus' basic attacks deal {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage over 2 seconds to all enemies around his target.

w1.blurb: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.
description: While the shield holds, his [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} over 2 seconds to his target and all enemies around them.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|15 to 35}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|30 to 70}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Titan's Wrath
notes: * ''Titan's Wrath'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Nautilus' ''previous orders.
* The first half of ''Titan's Wrath's'' damage is dealt on-hit (so long as the shield remains) while the rest is applied over the next second (regardless of ''Nautilus' ''attack speed).
* ''Nautilus' ''basic attacks use a different animation while ''Titan's Wrath'' is active.
** The damage over time will always apply when this animation plays (even if the shield fades during a basic attack).

* ''Titan's Wrath's'' shield can be artificially extended by using others ({{ai|Eye of the Storm|Janna}}, {{ai|Help, Pix!|Lulu}}) in order to keep it from breaking before the maximum duration ends (they will not allow ''Nautilus'' to apply ''Titan's Wrath's'' damage if they are still active when it does).
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* ''Titan's Wrath's'' bonus damage will not interact with {{tip|critical strike}}s nor affect structures.

* The bonus damage will be applied (but not the enhanced attack's) if ''Titan's Wrath'' is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or if ''Nautilus'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability (but only a single application).

riot.name: Riptide
riot.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

e1.blurb: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nautilus''' creates 3 waves of explosions that radiate from him, each dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by an amount that decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
Enemies hit by subsequent waves beyond the first are dealt half damage.
leveling: {{st|Additional Magic Damage|{{ap|27.5|42.5|57.5|72.5|87.5}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}|Total Single-Target Damage|{{ap|110|170|230|290|350}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
e1.name: Riptide
notes: * ''Riptide's'' waves radiate only from the cast location rather than from '''Nautlius'''.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single wave.

riot.name: Depth Charge
riot.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
riot.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to other enemies it passes through, knocking them into the air, and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

r1.blurb: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nautilus''' sends out a {{ai|Depth Charge 2|Nautilus|Depth Charge}} that chases the target enemy champion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} while {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for 1 second and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them on arrival.
All enemies hit along the way are dealt less damage, {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second, and are also {{tip|stun|stunned}}.
r1.name: Depth Charge
notes: * Despite being a projectile, ''Depth Charge'' cannot be intercepted by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} (possibly its nature of travelling underground).
* ''Depth Charge'' permeates through terrain, and will accelerate over time to ensure it cannot be outran (only extreme movement speed could potentially make it so).
** Moving away for a vast distance ({{si|recall|recalling}}, {{si|Teleport|teleporting}}) before ''Depth Charge'' hits will make the projectile disappear.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the entire ability only for the primary target.

riot.name: Depth Charge
riot.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
riot.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to other enemies it passes through, knocking them into the air, and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

r2.blurb: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nautilus''' sends out a {{ai|Depth Charge 2|Nautilus|Depth Charge}} that chases the target enemy champion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} while {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for 1 second and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them on arrival.
All enemies hit along the way are dealt less damage, {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second, and are also {{tip|stun|stunned}}.
r2.name: Depth Charge
notes: * Despite being a projectile, ''Depth Charge'' cannot be intercepted by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} (possibly its nature of travelling underground).
* ''Depth Charge'' permeates through terrain, and will accelerate over time to ensure it cannot be outran (only extreme movement speed could potentially make it so).
** Moving away for a vast distance ({{si|recall|recalling}}, {{si|Teleport|teleporting}}) before ''Depth Charge'' hits will make the projectile disappear.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the entire ability only for the primary target.
